Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Abbas 
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a basket of flowers from Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on
the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 12th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
 The floral basket was conveyed to DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah on Tuesday.

Floral Basket and Letters to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a letter from the Diplomatic Corps here and a letter from the Economic and Commercial Councilors' Corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun
and the 12th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
 The floral basket and letter from the Diplomatic Corps were conveyed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun by Palestinian Ambassador Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, who is doyen of the corps and the letter from the Economic and Commercial Councilors' Corps to an official concerned by Commercial Councilor of the Cuban embassy Evelio Duenas Ponce who is doyen of the corps on Tuesday.

Foreign Diplomats Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Economic and Commercial Councilors' Corps here visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Tuesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 The corps laid a floral basket before the statue and paid homage to the President.
